thread.title: Scarlett Johansson’s celebrity crushes will leave you drooling, literally
thread.title_full: Scarlett Johansson’s celebrity crushes will leave you drooling, literally

author: Lindsey Sirera
title: Scarlett Johansson’s celebrity crushes will leave you drooling, literally
text:
Scarlett Johansson’s celebrity crushes will leave you drooling, literally Scarlett Johansson may be amidst a painful divorce — a painful divorce she won’t be talking about anytime soon , mind you — but that doesn’t mean the actress is never going to talk about her love life ever again. As a matter of fact, the celebrity mama opened up on The Howard Stern Show about her own celebrity crush(es). And her responses might leave your jaw drooling… err , dropping.
Instead of a hunky, chiseled superhero type like one of her Avengers co-stars, it turns our ScarJo is much more a fan of foodie dudes.
“Honestly I’m like somebody who likes Gordon Ramsay,” Scarlett told the legendary talk show host after some coaxing. “Or Anthony Bourdain. There’s a running theme.” Photo by Mike Pont/WireImage Pursuing a man who knows his way around the kitchen as a viable love interest? We dig that logic, Scarlett!
Photo by FOX via Getty Images Don’t expect to see the 32-year-old mom of baby daughter, Rose, to hit the dating pool anytime soon, however. With a full plate as a successful actress and doting mom, she’s got plenty of other things to worry about right now.
“I’m on guard because I have a young daughter. That’s something I’m more concerned about,” she told Stern when asked about her dating timeline post-split. And we ~totally~ respect that. Family comes first.
In the meantime, we’ll just be daydreaming about how epic it’d be to date a guy with Anthony or Gordon’s cooking chops.
